settings.text: "It is value for money, best sound especially bass"
"Amazing product, great sound quality and the mic performance is also awesome."

settings.description: Ever since making her first appearance as a boAthead for the #GlamourOfTheStars campaign since June 2019, Kiara's journey with boAthead has been impecable, inspirational and influentional.
Keeping the flag of #GlamourOfTheStars high and in full flow Kartik Aaryan has added an immense deal of coolness here during his journey as a boAthead
Just the way he swivels his bat and makes gigantic home runs look so easy, our #SoundOfTheChampions star has cleared the boundary on numerous occasions ever since he’s been aboard as a boAthead
boAthead Neha Kakkar’s stylish presence makes the deck stay lit as her captivating voice adds that superb boAthead spirit to #SoulOfTheMusicians and makes everything go groovin’
Expect a powerful and smooth flowing drive through the covers when the classy boAthead KL Rahul decides to up the ante and take #SoundOfTheChampions to another new level

When the Gabbar of International Cricket carries the baton of #SoundOfTheChampions, expect great things in the offering. Our hard hitting boAthead Shikhar Dhawan creates memorable times with his presence.
It’s a treat to watch boAthead Shreyas Iyer’s determined stance on the field and the way he produces a sweet sound with his bat, just like #SoundOfTheChampions

settings.title: Smart Watches For A Smarter You
settings.text: Take your fitness game to the next level with a boAt smart watch. Smart just got better looking!

settings.title: boAt Blog
settings.pillar_title: Earphones Buying Guide - Everything You Need To Know
settings.pillar_title_2: The Ultimate Smartwatch Guide - Get The World On Your Wrist

settings.text: Your partner for every vibe, Airdopes 16 earbuds pump uninterrupted music with its massive playback of upto 17 hour. And when you run out of battery, you can enjoy 180 mins of music with just 10 minutes of charge. Grooving has never been so hasslefree with Bluetooth v5.1 that seamlessly plays your music.

Optimists! Watch Iris is here to get you up and running through the week with a 7-day battery backup. For people who see the world in colour and not black and white, choose from multiple watch faces to go with your outfit of the day. With IP68 sweat, splash and dust resistance ace every sport you play in 8 different sports modes. Strive for a better performance. Switch over to the bright side!

Say yes to Wellness with Mystiq! Make fitness fun with this all in one smartwatch that comes with HIIT Mode with Animated Personal Coach. Experience crisp image quality and colors that pop with its 1.57" Square HD Display. Stay fit with multiple sports modes and health monitoring. Change lifestyle, choose Mystiq.

Gear up to live on the edge with Mercury! Immerse in your world with its 1.54” inch TFT display. Keep a track of your health with real time temperature monitoring and embrace an active lifestyle with different sports modes. Get, set, & conquer the world with the smartwatch Mercury!
